metadata.title: CVE-2020-27818 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the check_chunk_name() function of pngcheck-2.4.0. An attacker able to pass a malicious file to be processed by pngcheck could cause a temporary denial of service, posing a low risk to application availability.

criterions.comment: pngcheck package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
